creator: jenriqu@smud.org
text:
Our server is scheduled to restart tomcat5.exe to relieve memory leaks on a 
daily basis. Our HTTP site is fine but our HTTPS is not. HTTP status 404 - / 
is the error message.type Status report - message / description The requested 
resource (/) is not available.

We run Documentum on this site. We simply ask the user community to remoe 
the 's' on the HTTP'S' to enter the Documentum login site. This occurs 2-3 
times a week. Can we get an Apache troubleshooter. What does he or she need to 
start the troubleshooting. I can send any information they need.

Thanks for your assistance.

Jayson Enriquez
EDM Application Support

creator: shankarunni@netscape.net
text:
Support requests (like this one) belong on the tomcat-user (at
jakarta.apache.org) mailing list.

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
The correct address for the users list is given here:

http://tomcat.apache.org/lists.html
